millsfield:images_texts:
CHAMPAGNE
POL ROGER CUVEE WINSTON CHURCHILL, 1986
"I CANNOT LIVE WITHOUT CHAMPAGNE. IN VICTORY WE DESERVE IT, IN DEFEAT WE
NEED IT".
IT WAS WINSTON CHURCHILL HIMSELF WHO REFERRED TO THE HOUSE OF POL ROGER
AS "THE WORLD'S MOST DRINKABLE ADDRESS". A COMPLIMENT THAT WAS REPAID BY
THE HOUSE AFTER HIS DEATH IN 1965 WHEN THEY BORDERED THEIR LABELS IN BLACK
IN REMEMBERANCE OF THE GREAT MAN.
THE WINE ITSELF IS A CLASSIC, PINOT NOIR DOMINATED BLEND OF EXTRAORDINARY
DEFINI AND FAVOUK. A POWERFUL CHAMPAGNE WHICH S ENIOYABLE WITH FOOD
OR AS AN APERITIE
WHITE BURGUNDY
DOMAINES DU CHATEAU DE BEAUNE:
CHEVALIER-MONTRACHET GRAND CRU 1991
THE MONTRACHET VINEYARDS IN THE COTE DE BEAUNE MUST SURELY BE THE MOST
FAMOUS WHITE WINE VINEYARDS IN THE WORLD. THE FIVE GRAND CRU VINEYARDS
ARE EACH TINY AND YET THEY MUST SATISFY A MARKET THAT IS INCREASINGLY
THIRSTY FOR THE PRODUCE. WE ARE DELIGHTED TO BE ABLE TO OFFER THIS 1991
CHEVALIER-MONTRACHET FROM THE DOMANIES DU CHATEAU DE BEAUNE, ONE OF
BURGUNDY'S OLDEST AND MOST PRESTIGIOUS HOUSES.
THE AROMAS ARE AN ALLURING BLEND OF RICH. RIPE FRUIT AND SUBTLE OAK; ON THE
PALATE LAYERS OF FLAVOUR ASSAULT THE TASTE BUDS; HONEY AND BUTTERY RICHNESS
AND, AGAIN, THAT SUBTLE OAKINESS THAT ROUNDS OFF THE FINISH. AS YOU
WOULD EXPECT FROM A GRAND CRU, IT IS A WINE OF STUNNING
CONCENTRATION.
RED BURGUNDY
Hospices de Beaune
1990
CORTON
Soled be BROADE CEMAR
CORTON GRAND CRU, CUVÃ‰E DOCTEUR PESTE, 1990
HOSPICES DE BEAUNE
THE BEAUTIFUL BURGUNDIAN WINES FROM THE 1990 VINTAGE ARE JUST NOW
REACHING THEIR PEAK, YET SUCH WAS THE POWER OF THIS GREAT YEAR THAT THEY
WILL HAPPILY REMAIN AT THAT PEAK FOR MANY YEARS TO COME.
THE ANNUAL AUCTION OF THE WINES OF THE HOSPICES DE BEAUNE, A CHARITABLE
INSTITUTION, TAKES PLACE IN MID-NOVEMBER. WE WERE LUCKY ENOUGH TO BUY 10
HOGSHEADS, JUST 250 CASES, OF WHAT WAS ARGUABLY THE BEST RED WINE
AVAILABLE IN 1990 - A GRAND CRU BLENDED FROM FIVE VINEYARD SITES ON THE HILL
CFCOKION. NAMED AFTEK INE BENEFACIOR WHO DONATED THE VINEYARDS.T
HAS THE CHARACTERISTIC SOFT BERRY AROMAS OF PINOT NOIR BUT IT ALSO HAS A
SPICINESS, A DEPTH OF FLAVOUR AND A ROUNDNESS NOT ALWAYS ASSOCIATED
WITH THIS GRAPE
PORT
DOW'S
1978
RESERVE
PORT
DOWS 1978 RESERVE TAWNY PORT
DOWS, ONE OF THE LEADING PORT HOUSES, WAS ESTABLISHED IN 1798 AND IS
NOW RUN BY THE SYMINGTON FAMILY. BASED AT THE QUINTA DO BOMFIN AT
PINHAO, WIDELY CONSIDERED TO BE ONE OF THE FINEST QUINTAS ON THE DUORO,
IT HAS LONG BEEN A SOURCE OF PORT OF THE VERY HIGHEST QUALITY.
THE 1978 RESERVE IS A VINTAGE DATED, FINE OID TAWNY, A SUBLIME WINE WHICH
INCORPORATES A SMOOTH, SILKY TEXTURE WITH A MELLOW, SWEET, NUTTY FLAVOUR. A
COMPLEX PORT OF STYLE AND FINESSE, DRINKING QUITE SUPERBLY AND PROVIDING THE
PERFECT END TO ANY MEAL.
